meanings.definition: The state of being one; oneness.
meanings.sent1: The teacher emphasized the importance of unities in a team.
meanings.sent2: The unities of the family were evident during the holiday gathering.
meanings.sent3: The unities of the puzzle pieces made it easy to solve.
meanings.sent4: The unities of the orchestra created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The unities of the colors in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: A whole or totality as combining all its parts into one.
meanings.sent1: The unities of the cake ingredients resulted in a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent2: The unities of the planets form the solar system.
meanings.sent3: The unities of the Lego pieces made a perfect castle.
meanings.sent4: The unities of the team's efforts led to a championship win.
meanings.sent5: The unities of the story's plot kept the readers engaged.
